formatted_in_depth_analysis.statement: The synthesis of Co3O4/Co-Fe oxide double-shelled nanoboxes (DSNBs) via anion-exchange and annealing strategies enhances electrocatalytic performance for oxygen evolution reaction (OER).

The double-shelled structure and Fe incorporation in Co3O4/Co-Fe oxide DSNBs improve conductivity, active site exposure, and stability, leading to superior OER activity compared to single-shelled counterparts.

reflection_results.statement: The synthesis of Co3O4/Co-Fe oxide double-shelled nanoboxes (DSNBs) via anion-exchange and annealing strategies enhances electrocatalytic performance for oxygen evolution reaction (OER).
